text: Andrea Pollack (8 May 1961 - 13 March 2019) was a German butterfly swimmer. She was born in Schwerin, East Germany. Pollack won two gold medals at the 1976 Summer Olympics in Montreal, Quebec, Canada, at age fifteen. She won a gold in the 4Ã—100 m medley relay and a silver in the 100 m butterfly at the 1980 Moscow Olympics. Pollack died on 13 March 2019 from pancreatic cancer in Berlin, aged 57.Dreimalige Olympiasiegerin im Schwimmen verstorben ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1961 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for East Germany Category:Olympic silver medalists for East Germany Category:German swimmers
title: Andrea Pollack
